channel.title: 2 servers on a 1 computer using a virtual machine
channel.description: Okay so I want to run a 562 and a 317 on 1 computer. I have the 562 running right now with players on. I just got vmware player and put the 317 server files on there. I need to know what port forwarding or anything I need to do. I am running windows xp media center on the regular pc and on the virtual machine windows xp home edition if that helps at all. Thanks to anyone that helps me :) If they want I could give them admin on the 317 once I get in up and running.

item.title: 2 servers on a 1 computer using a virtual machine
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

yer do what wow said and once you have changed all the 43594 ports in the 317 server go to the client and up in the right corner there should be a search button well in there type 43594 and then change all them ports to 5555 then compile the server and client then you should be done oh yer and you need to portforword 5555 port. Hoped i helped.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 servers on a 1 computer using a virtual machine
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Run your 317 on port 5555 and the 562 on 43594
to male the 317 on 5555 just open server.java and search 43594 qnd change it too 5555
